DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate short-term mid-term safety efficacy Catania coronary stent treatment two de novo lesion native coronary artery .
DOC.brief_title: The ATLANTA First Man Study Catania Stent
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , first-in-man single center study . The study require 55 patient document myocardial ischemia undergo PCI .
DOC.criteria: Lesion length ≤ 20 mm Vessel size ≥ 2.5 ≤ 3.5 mm Life expectancy < 1 year Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 30 % Antithrombotic drug intolerance
